property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Title that displays at the top of the application. If defined, this title will appear at the top of each step. If empty, no application title will be displayed.

property.name: pagePosition
property.label: Title Alignment
property.description: Select the alignment for the title text. Options are: Left, Right and Center.

property.name: description
property.label: Description
property.description: Description for the collection of media files.

property.name: border
property.label: Show Border/Opaque
property.description: Select to display a border in Communities and for an opaque background in LEX.

property.name: fileBorder
property.label: Show Video File Borders
property.description: Select to display a border around the file.

property.name: recordIdValue
property.label: Record ID
property.description: When this component is used on an object detail page, you can define a specific record to display. To display the current record, enter {!recordId} in communities or recordId in LEX
